dt: {bc}a person who flees to a foreign country or power to escape danger or persecution

et: French {it}réfugié{/it}, past participle of ({it}se{/it}) {it}réfugier{/it} to take refuge, from Middle French {it}refugier{/it}, from Latin {it}refugium{/it}
shortdef: one that flees; especially : a person who flees to a foreign country or power to escape danger or persecution
